data.name: Princess Daphne - New Game+
data.detailed_description:
PRESENTATION


PUSH START AND PLAY NEW GAME+ IMMEDIATELY!

The Ultimate Challenge!

New Game+ is normally available after finishing the game, and offers a more difficult challenge. It is recommended to have completed Normal Game first.
This DLC lets you play New Game+ from the start, but with an extra kick: a choice between 3 types of fabulous bonuses!
Only Local Records apply. If you own the Avalon DLC, you can decide whether she joins the rest of the troops as well.

data.short_description: The Ultimate Challenge! Play New Game+ immediately and with extra advantages!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
